file_content.text: You're on the wrong planet! The Hutt Pleasure Worlds are a dozen parsecs out.
Shut up, Khomo.
You're in good shape for a dead woman.
You're looking good for a dead man.
Shae Vizla. I wasn't expecting Mandalorians.
We're what you got. Heard you need a factory pulverized.
A dozen clans stand with Mandalore the Avenger. We're ready for blood... even if our enemies are built of metal and grease.
"Mandalore the Avenger"?
Rough few years. Eternal Fleet's kept us under siege on the heartworlds. I picked up the title along the way.
"Mandalore the Avenger"? What happened to your predecessor?
I'm sorry. Zakuul hit your adopted clan hard. He died fighting.
Died fighting. Good man. Spoke well of you.
We've been under siege these past few years. Clan Vizla survived better than most. I ended up Mandalore mostly by accident.
Half the clans are scattered. Most of the rest are trapped on the heartworlds.
When your spy-boy offered a chance to hit back, I agreed. Been on defense too long.
Then we fight together, Mandalore, against Zakuul and the galaxy. We'll topple Arcann yet.
Glad to have you on our side.
Right now, I'd settle for one good victory.
If you're pulling the clans from their homes, you're looking for more than vengeance. What's your plan?
Why risk your forces here?
You need us, we need you. Good for everyone, long term. Plus, if we take Darvannis, we get the spoils.
Your people are mercenaries who use "honor" as an excuse for slaughter. You'll forgive me if I don't weep with sympathy.
I've never liked your kind.
We'll get them. For Mandalore.
Mandalore the Vindicated made me Mandalorian. For him, for my clan... we'll take vengeance.
The old Mandalore offered to adopt me into his clan. Turned him down. No regrets, but I'll shoot his killers just the same.
We'll all drink to that.
Haven't met many Mandalorians I'd be sorry to see go. For once, Zakuul had the right idea.
I've never liked your kind.
Your clans are savages. Your warriors are children compared to Sith. I have no pity for your troubles.
I've never liked your kind.
Words are the weapons of the impotent. When you want to fight, draw your weapon. Until then, save it for Zakuul.
Mandalore. The scout's back.
All right. Time to show you how a real war is fought.
How have you deployed your troops around the factory?
Rotating assault teams of two hundred commandos each. Place is a fortress, needs hammering before we go in.
Next attack starts in five. Forward teams are in position to down the energy shield.
You want to be useful? Capture the perimeter guns and retarget the factory. Torian!
Mand'alor.
Torian's chief of Clan Cadera and the best scout we've got. He'll show the way.
Guns are in sector nine. Plenty of Skytroopers. Keep up. I'll try to protect you.
Let's go to war, then.
I didn't come here to play foot soldier, Mandalore. When I lead, I lead from the front.
I should be in command.
You may think you're hot stuff, but no Mandalorian takes orders from an outsider. You want to fight, you prove yourself, same as anyone.
Besides, it's too late to change the plan. Units are already moving.
I don't need "protection."
I'm a Master of the Jedi Order. I've fought Sith and monsters and Knights of Zakuul. There's not much you can do to protect me.
Trust me, I can hold my own. Havoc Squad may be gone, but I've been fighting longer than I can remember.
I may not carry a gun the size of my head, but trust me: I know my way around a battlefield.
You speak to a Lord of the Sith. Do not condescend to me, boy.
Don't get killed on my account. I've survived battles that would give you nightmares.
You're not Mandalorian. Figured I shouldn't assume.
Take me to the guns. We have a factory to conquer.
Ret'urcye mhi, Mand'alor.
Riduur. Beloved.
Torian. What are you doing here? I know how long it's been... but I never forgot you.
I've missed you!
Never thought you would.
Ner vod. Sister.
Ner vod. Brother.
Torian! Ha! It's been five years too long, my friend... where've you been hiding?
It's blasted good to see you!
Could ask the same of you. Never thought you'd disappear somewhere I couldn't track.
Should've known I'd find you here. Look at you: Mandalore's right-hand man, fighting impossible battles...
Been a while, kid.
The impossible ones are always worth fighting.
Torian Cadera. Figured you'd be dead by now.
Never could get rid of you.
Funny. Always figured you made it out.
I gather you know each other, but save it for later--we're short on time.
Right. Let's capture those guns and talk after. You good to fight?
Better than ever.
Stay alive, both of you.
